question: How many team members can I invite?
answer: You can invite up to 10 team members on our basic plan. For larger teams, consider upgrading to our premium plan for unlimited invitations.

question: What is the maximum file upload size?
answer: The maximum file upload size is 2GB per file. Ensure that your total storage usage does not exceed your allotted space.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on Forgot Password. Follow the instructions sent to your registered email address.

question: Can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your billing cycle.

question: Do you provide additional support?
answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 customer support via email and chat. For more personalized assistance, you can opt for our premium support package.
